Name: Cullinan Belek
Description:
Designed with eco-friendly architecture in mind, the hotel reflects the Mediterranean atmosphere in the interiors with soothing orange tones, rich marble details, decorative elegance and heavenly garden culture.
CULLINAN Belek borders the most beautiful and longest coast of Antalya Belek, the tourism paradise. It has a total area of 170,000 sqm with a total of 600 rooms. It consists of Lagoon rooms, villas, and main building with 8 floors and 8 elevators.
800 m natural sandy private beach with 2 piers. 
For early arrivals you can use the “CULLINAN LOUNGE” where you can change clothes, shower, relax and store valuables in the lockers.
If the room wishes to be used on the day of departure, guests can continue to use their room subject to availability and at an additional cost.  
The hotel is located 26 km from Antalya Airport, 3 km from Kadriye Shopping Mall, 6 km from Belek Shopping Mall and 36 km from Antalya City Center. It is within walking distance of the CULLINAN LINKS GOLF CLUB, which has 36 holes (9 of which are night-lit) and is the only golf course that runs parallel to the sea and the river.
